var myHome = {
"name": "Mannat",
"location":"Mumbai",
"Colour":"black",
"owner":"sharukh khan",
"neighbours": ["everything!"],
"isGood":true
};

delete myHome.isGood;
console.log(myHome)


//output
// {
// name: 'Mannat',
// location: 'Mumbai',
// Colour: 'black',
// owner: 'sharukh khan',
// neighbours: [ 'everything!' ]
// }
isGood property is deleted from an object myHome.
Then in myHome object we are going to delete a property named isGood and we are deleting isGood property.
